creator: jcampom@hotmail.com
text:
Hi,
I tried to connect to a Oracle Database,and this is the error:
Fatal error: Call to undefined function: ora_logon() in 
d:\apache\htdocs\intrasga-2\sga_gstk_0001.php on line 14

The line 14 is:
$connection = Ora_Logon("user@connect_string", "password");
(obviously, I replaced the real username, password and connect string) :-)

Is this error solved? if so, ¿what's the version which solve it?
I have installed Apache 1.3.14

Thanx in advance.

please contact oracle for oracle support.
or even PHP for their support.

this is the APACHE HTTPD bug queue.

(FYI it looks like php is not built correctly)
creator: ianh@apache.org
